sub_title: Foreign Legal Consultant and Associate – SINCERE QIANHAI LAW OFFICES/Certified Scrum Master
summary:
Kumbayeva Aigerim is a Kazakh lawyer and a foreign legal consultant in China. She is keen to develop her career as a project management specialist and develop herself into a project management professional. She is currently enrolled at the University of Toronto and completing courses on Project Management.

She has lived in China for 8 years and has completed her bachelor's and master's degrees in law. She is proficient in several languages. She graduated from Tsinghua University. She also works as a foreign mediator in the Qianhai court. She has been consulting with foreign and Chinese clients on Kazakhstan and Chinese law for several years and is familiar with Chinese law and culture. She has been consulting with foreign clients on a Chinese company, contract, labor, and other legal matters for several years. Additionally, she made a research on "one belt and one road countries" and was one of the authors of the BRICS legal report where she translated Russian legislation into Chinese and wrote comments on it.
